title: Watch how the world brought in 2023
description: As the world turns more and more countries greet 2023.

title: Archbishop of Canterbury calls for leaders to fix social care
description: The Most Reverend Justin Welby uses his new year's message to highlight the social care crisis.

title: Cody Fisher: Two men charged with Birmingham nightclub stabbing murder
description: Non-league footballer Cody Fisher was fatally attacked at a club in Birmingham on Boxing Day.

title: Ukraine war: Zelensky tells Russians - Putin is destroying you
description: Ukraine's president says his country will never forgive Russians for the terror they have inflicted.

title: Pope Francis and world leaders pay tribute to Benedict XVI
description: The head of the Catholic Church pays his respects to his predecessor Benedict, who resigned from his post in 2013.

title: Vivienne Westwood: Julian Assange to ask for prison leave for funeral, says wife
description: The Wikileaks founder fighting extradition to the US will seek leave from Belmarsh, his wife says.

title: Scarborough: Rare walrus sighting draws huge crowds to harbour
description: Local wildlife experts say it may be the first time a walrus has been seen in Yorkshire.

title: TV presenter Matthew Bassett shows life goes on with spinal injury
description: A trip to the beach changed Matthew Bassett's life - now he's determined to say yes to everything.

title: Cost of living crisis: Sickle cell families staying in bed for warmth
description: Charity Oscar Birmingham says the cold leads to painful sickle cell flare-ups and hospital stays.

title: Wallasey pub shooting: Police release third person arrested
description: The 31-year-old had been arrested on suspicion of conspiracy to murder but has now been released.

title: Marathon man Gary McKee hits £1m goal after 365th run of 2022
description: Gary McKee had been aiming to reach the target for charity, having run 26.2 miles every day this year.

title: UN seeks top court opinion on Israeli occupation
description: The vote has been hailed a victory by Palestinians and described as "despicable" by Israel.

title: Home insulation: How can it cut energy bills?
description: Better home insulation could save some households hundreds of pounds a year on their energy bills.

title: BBC Food's vegetarian family £1 recipe meal plan
description: This budget-friendly veggie meal plan covers a week's worth of dinners for four adults, coming in at under £28 in total.

title: What is the energy price cap and what will happen to bills?
description: The energy bill support package will continue after April, but will be less generous.

title: BBC Food's family £1 recipe meal plan
description: This budget-friendly meal plan covers a week's worth of dinners for four adults, coming in at under £28 in total.

title: Battery lights vs mains LED bulbs: What's cheaper?
description: As some shoppers swap mains bulbs for battery lights, we investigate if money is really being saved.

title: Mortgages: What happens if I miss a payment?
description: Homeowners are worried about higher mortgage costs - but lenders must help those struggling.

title: The Papers: Better times ahead, says PM, and tributes to Pope
description: The first front pages of 2023 cover a range of stories, including Rishi Sunak promising "better times ahead".

title: New Year's Eve: World celebrates arrival of 2023
description: The Pacific nation of Kiribati was the first to see in the new year - followed by New Zealand.

title: How a secret message in a Colombian song gave hostages hope
description: When the pop song Better Days was released in 2010, it contained a secret message hidden in the catchy tune.

title: Love at first fight: The re-enactors who find romance
description: Who needs online dating apps when you can meet eligible partners at the tip of a sword?

title: Sound Of 2023: Earthquaking soul band Gabriels tipped for success
description: The soul-quaking sounds of Gabriels have earned the band fifth place in Radio 1's Sound Of 2023 list.

title: Ukraine war: Ballerinas fight culture war against Russia
description: The United Ukrainian Ballet represent the country's cultural frontline against the Russian invasion.

title: Czechoslovakia: Czechs and Slovaks mark 30 years since Velvet Divorce
description: Thirty years since their break-up, Slovakia and the Czech Republic have a harmonious relationship.

title: Benedict: The pope who resigned from the papacy
description: Obituary of Benedict XVI, a conservative figure who became the first pope to stand down in 600 years.

title: The Big Eurovision Party: Rylan to bring in 2023 with song contest stars
description: Memorable acts from the song contest's history performed at a special concert in The Netherlands.

title: Pelé: Why black Brazilians like me mourn the king
description: Pelé won his first World Cup only 70 years after slavery was finally abolished in Brazil.

title: Photographers pick their top shots of the year
description: Press Association photographers reflect on their best images from the past year.

title: Do restrictions on travel work against Covid?
description: Is there evidence that travel restrictions help stop the spread of coronavirus?

title: Mikel Arteta plays down Arsenal's title hopes despite seven-point lead at New Year
description: Mikel Arteta and Bukayo Saka insist Arsenal are not getting carried away, despite leading the league by seven points at the end of 2022.

title: 2023 sporting calendar: The year's main events from Women's World Cup football to Ashes series and men's rugby union World Cup
description: The 2023 sporting calendar features World Cups in women's football and men's rugby union as well as men's and women's Ashes cricket series and the Ryder Cup.

title: Manchester City 1-1 Everton: Demarai Gray cancels out Erling Haaland opener
description: Demarai Gray's stunner cancels out Erling Haaland's opener as Manchester City draw with Everton in a fractious Premier League affair.

title: Match of the Day analysis: Marcus Rashford shines for Manchester United off bench after being dropped
description: Match of the Day pundits Alan Shearer and Danny Murphy analyse Marcus Rashford's performance at Wolves after he was dropped to the bench for internal disciplinary reasons.

title: United Cup: Cameron Norrie beats Rafael Nadal as Britain go 2-0 up over Spain
description: Cameron Norrie beats Rafael Nadal for the first time before Katie Swan sees off Nuria Parrizas-Diaz in the United Cup.

title: Newcastle United 0-0 Leeds United: Magpies held but end 2022 third in table
description: Eddie Howe says 2022 has been a "year of real progress" after Newcastle end it third in the table despite being held to a draw by Leeds.

title: Premiership: Saracens 35-3 Exeter Chiefs - Leaders earn bonus-point win
description: Saracens earn a comprehensive victory over rivals Exeter to take their lead at top of the Premiership back to 10 points.

title: Prince Harry's Spare to kick off book bonanza
description: Join us as we lift the curtain on some of the most anticipated books coming our way next year.

title: Television highlights to look out for next year
description: Doctor Who, a 007 global contest and the return of Waterloo Road are among next year's TV treats.

title: 23 films coming out in 2023
description: From Oscars hopefuls such as The Fabelmans to crowd-pleasers like the Barbie movie.

title: New Year Honours 2023: Pat Jennings, Dara McAnulty and John Bennett on NI list
description: Dara McAnulty and Pat Jennings are among those from Northern Ireland on the New Year Honours list.

title: New Year Honours 2023: Brian May and Lionesses on list
description: The Queen guitarist is knighted in a list that also celebrates the Lionesses' Euro 2022 victory.

title: New Year Honours 2023: Grayson Perry and Brian May lead cultural roll call
description: Artist Grayson Perry and Queen's Brian May are among the cultural figures in the New Year Honours.

title: Lionesses recognised as Denise Lewis made dame
description: England players Leah Williamson and Beth Mead and former Olympic heptathlon champion Denise Lewis are among those recognised in the New Year's Honours

title: Knighthoods for MPs who caused Boris Johnson headaches
description: Chris Bryant and Julian Lewis are among the political figures recognised in the New Year Honours list.

title: New Year Honours 2023: Scotland footballers named on list
description: Business leaders, a master distiller and a Beano illustrator are among those recognised by the King.
